fragment.sub_volume_note: SCRIPTORES AETATIS INCERTAE EX ORDINE LITERARUM
fragment.author: POLYANTHUS CYRENAEUS
fragment.witness: Sextus Emp. Adv. Math. I, 12, p. 271 ed. Fabric.:
fragment.text: Πολύανθος δὲ ὁ Κυρηναῖος ἐν τῷ Περὶ τῆς τῶν Ἀσκληπιαδῶν γενέσεως (sc. Ἀσκληπιὸν κεκεραυνῶσθαι λέγει), ὅτι τὰς Προίτου θυγατέρας κατὰ χόλον Ἥρας ἐμμανεῖς γενομένας ἰάσατο.
fragment.translation: Polyanthus (sive Polyarchus) in libro De Asclepiadarum generatione Aesculapium propterea dicit fulmine ictum esse, quod Proeti filias, quibus Junonis ira insaniam injecerat, sanitati restituit.
fragment.commentary: Schol. Eur. Alc. 1 exhibet eadem, omisso libri titulo. Pro Πολύανθος ibi legitur Πολύαρχος. Cf. Phylarch. fr. 17.
